title: Ticket #497: Update the CHTC configuration to allow a separate whole machine slot..
description:
Make the 9th slot a whole machine slot:
  • Add a slot to the CHTC machines
  • This slot should have CPUS=8 and be the whole machine slot.
  • The other slots should have CPUS set to 1.

Make the 9th slot only run for users that have a better (lower) priority than the users on all the other slots (see 3.4.3 in the manual):

  • Make all the startd's advertise their RemoteUserPrio
  • Make a Macro that checks SubmitterUserPrio against RemoteUserPrio (SLOT#_RemoteUserPrio? yes, look at GLOW configuration.. it's not documented in the manual).
  • Use this macro in the START expression. Note that this expression must drop out when these items are undefined as they will be in the startd and the schedd. (they're only present in the negotiator).
remarks:
